website_summaries.verdict: An adjustable bed that won't break your budget and will maintain its appearance for years to come.
pros: Offers programmable elevation positions and head and foot massage capabilities for supreme comfort
Comes with an easy-to-use wireless remote with preset and programmable settings
Features adjustable legs for three different height options
Ideal for use with memory foam, latex, and air mattresses
cons: The bed's massagers leave much to be desired

customer_reviews.title: Remote did not work at first!
customer_reviews.text: When my adult children put the bed together, it did not work! They checked wires here and checked wires there! It seemed that there was no way that it was getting electricity as the remote would do nothing. All the appropriate green lights were on, even the USB Port! Later after giving up for awhile, my son checked a You Tube Video and the remote had to be "Paired!" No where in the instructions was this mentioned! Thanks to his tenacity, the bed is now working properly!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: The middle legs are bended, even if I try to correct them, and the head part, when is "flat" is lower than the foot part. Worst part is that after 2 weeks, they lower the price for more than 200 dollars!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Reselling Returned items as New.
customer_reviews.text: This was obviously returned and then tried to pass on to me as New. As you can see in second picture how it should of been packaged and first picture was how it looked upon opening. Mechanical rise devices not packages and thrown about. Wiring Not wrapped and secured as shown. Wiring to foot rise is questionable if it will remain plugged in; so tightly pulled. USB PORT is real joke!! Over heats and could cause a FIRE!! DON'T USE!! Called Classic Brands 1800 line-What a Joke! Just on a repeating message that won't let you talk to anyone. Praying it holds up, specially after reading previous reviews. I will repost if he does break down further.
customer_reviews.author: A. Simeone

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for .....
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with broken USB section (Top part cracked off), remote that did not work and one of the massager motor wires severed. (See attached pictures). I contacted support and they sent the wrong USB part 2 times (Twice) even after I sent detailed pictures (twice). I gave up and sent the unit back.
customer_reviews.author: MAB_In_CLT

customer_reviews.title: Works on most adjustable beds with round legs!
customer_reviews.text: I used these on a Ghost bed foundation but the best part is they will likely work on any adjustable bed foundation that has round legs. I did have to compromise as they were just barely long enough which meant I could only attach at one point instead of the two it's built for but my headboard is against a wall and the official brackets cost over $100 so I am happy with the purchase even if it is not as stable as if I had both bolts attached at leg.
customer_reviews.author: Dax

customer_reviews.title: broke no one will honer warranty
customer_reviews.text: The foot retainer bar broke after a couple weeks of use. Now the mattress slides all over and adjusting it just makes the mattress slide off the foot of the bed. The metal bar is fitted into plastic cups that are just set (not glued or anything) into wholes in the pressed board frame. The plastic cup broke and the whole in the wood is to big to hold the retainer bar. After months of emailing asking for parts i give up. There is no warranty that you can get anyone to honer.
customer_reviews.author: Steph in MI

customer_reviews.title: Bad engineering communication, they don't fit the legs
customer_reviews.text: I bought an adjustable bed frame and added the option of these head board brackets. Somebody in engineering for the brackets did not communicate to the engineer in the bed frame department. The brackets are supposed to clamp around the bed legs. However, the bed legs are 2 inch diameter and the clamping design on the brackets are for 1 1/2 inch.
customer_reviews.author: jkhughes

customer_reviews.title: Bad recommendation by Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when choosing mattress & adjustable bed frame. Amazon recommended a Dynasty mattress ( which I purchased to go with bed frame. Mattress is much too thick (12 inch) and firm to allow bed frame to lift legs properly. Will not do the bend for under knees. Now am stuck with a mattress that would probably cost at least purchase price (?) to return not to mention how to package (came compressed). I like the frame but is almost useless for purpose bought with mattress recommended for it.
customer_reviews.author: LOLA J.

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied, two years later!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this base (queen) since August of 2017 and love it as much now as I did when I first purchased! It was easy to assemble and has worked perfectly for the past nearly two years. I have the Purple mattress on it, just wanted to save a little money on the base so took a chance wth this one and I have zero regrets. The vibration is not super strong, but I don’t use that option much anyway. The adjustable option I use nightly. I have had to change the batteries in my remote once. I would definitely recommend this base and am happy I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katee & Ava's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: 8 MONTHS LATER, BED ISNT WORKING
customer_reviews.text: Eight months....eight months. Over 700 dollars for a king size adjustable bed base, and it's not working. We don't even use it every night, and it's already broke. Replaced batteries, tried the reset button, tried to resync remote although there are no directions or a manual to be found anywhere, and nothing. So almost 800 dollars for a bed base that's the equivalent of a $40 metal bed rail, and $15 worth of plyboard since without the adjust and massage feature, that's what this is.
customer_reviews.author: girlnextdoor

customer_reviews.title: The bed is great but COCKROACH infested headboard brackets.
customer_reviews.text: This is everything I never knew I needed. I love being able to adjust the bed instead of adding 10 pillows to prop myself into certain positions. My only downside is the legs come screwed together so longest legs and 1 of the 8 legs could not be seperated (even by a strong man) so I have to have the bed at the highest point which makes it a little hard for me to get into. I had originally rated the bed as a 5 which I will stand by but when I recieved the brackets late, I opened the box and cockroaches ran out from the box, DISGUSTING!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pixie

customer_reviews.title: Theses do not fit
customer_reviews.text: The brackets will not fit when purchasing with the designated bed frame. The clamps are too small to fit around the legs of the frame. The manufacture knows about this issue but unless you want to personally modify them there is no current fix.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Yes I'm happy and can't wait to follow up with a 3 month report
customer_reviews.text: I may update this later to a 5 star but I wanted people to know it only took a 62 year old guy 45 minutes to unbox, attach legs, motors and USB outlet. All work just as expected. My new mattress arrives later and my grandson is going to help move it into place later.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyG

customer_reviews.title: No More Flat Beds
customer_reviews.text: This one does the trick. Quiet operation, easy remote and extra range of movement. Quality! EXTRA FAVORITE FEATURE that no one mentioned: Raise both the head and foot up all the way when you're not on it and the mattress comes up to chest level. It makes it super easy to change your linens or make your bed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott P.

customer_reviews.title: Bed’s USB ports are melting my charging cables at both ends.
customer_reviews.text: USB ports are a fire hazard. The adjustable bed works fine, including vibration, after a year of ownership. The remote control has no backlight, but is functional as Ling as you know what buttons to push. However, I noticed recently that my devices are getting hot while charging on various cables plugged into the bed’s USB ports. This week, a cable end that plugs into my iPhone got so hot that it melted (to the point of being unusable). Fortunately. I was able to pull the cable out of the phone. Will update my review if the company responds to my service request about the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jim F.

customer_reviews.title: SO easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: SO easy to put together. Took less than 30 minutes. The vibrating function is kind of odd. I didn't like it but my mom does. It is nice that you can set a "preset" on the remote so she can quickly go to the position she sleeps in after watching TV. This bed is greatly contributing to her health in aiding with her swelling legs and issues with breathing at night. She sleeps much better and is much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Leana

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service. Poor at resolving issue on a timely manor
customer_reviews.text: My motor went out after only having it six months. I have for two weeks now tried to get company to send a new one . Even tho I have a three year warranty the company is giving me so many problems trying to get replacement. There customer service is very poor. Getting answers and replacement is taking way too long. It is as tho the company does not want to honor there warranties.
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Will Not Last
customer_reviews.text: Electronics lasted 3 years 2 months just out of warranty. The Function control box under the bed is cheap garbage about $10 of radio shack parts. To get it replaced they want $185 plus shipping. What a POS company. I would not recommend them if the beds went down to $100 unless you can do what I ended up doing and that was Hardwiring the head and foot motors using 2 toggle switches a $5 plastic project box and $2 worth of wire. Classic Brands are the worst people to deal with as well. Junk junk junk
customer_reviews.author: MR Mike

customer_reviews.title: So many adjustments
customer_reviews.text: I love this adjustable bed! Now it is extremely heavy so multiple people will be needed. Putting it together is very simple but turning it over upright is a chore with just 2 people (females). Love that batteries can be inserted in the power cord box to allow for operation if the power goes out! The ability to save a sleeping position is great. I have a 12 inch foam mattress with a 3 inch topper and it adjusts and moves with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Improved!
customer_reviews.text: The previous reviews seem to be from around 2017. Well they have definitely made improvements on this product! Just purchased full size and it was fully assembled. The only thing I had to do was screw in the legs, and they are straight and not cheap metal, and put batteries in the remote. Cords were all plugged in, no pairing of remote to motors. Worked immediately! The motors are quite and smooth and pretty quick. The remote now lights up when a button is pressed. The massage feature offers a continuous, intermittent and wave mode. More of a vibration but hard to tell as I have a 13 inch air mattress on it. Feels nice though!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Boddicker

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a year and now dead. Won’t work.
customer_reviews.text: It was a great adjustable bed until it stopped working after 12 months. Also a lot of noise when moving around in the bed. Not a quiet bed. Looking forward to see how good their warranty is.
customer_reviews.author: Foreman I.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 beds now. The lasted is a split king so it may count as 4. I love the way these frames are upholstered. They look nice and clean. I bought the first one 3 years ago and it still looks and works like new. I haven't found this bed anywhere cheaper except today on Wayfair for only $10 difference. It is well worth the extra to purchase it on Amazon. If I have a problem Amazon will make anything right. The mattresses they offer as a set are the cool gel and are great. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working pretty quickly
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this bed for awhile but it stopped working about 3 months after we got it. Just getting around to doing the review. I know it was more affordable but we still expected it to last longer than it did. We’re disappointed as we needed it for several reasons. It has completely stopped being adjustable, no vibration whatsoever either. Still charges phone but that’s it.
customer_reviews.author: Deja

customer_reviews.title: Head and foot motor damaged
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this product at all... It has very cheap motors. 1st day it worked fine. 2nd day head and foot motor damaged. When I tried to lift my head or foot motor it give hissing sound and doesn't lift. I called classic brand support and they are simply ignoring my compalints. If they are not going to respond by tomorrow, I will return it to amazon. Another good lesson for me not to buy cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: Vik

customer_reviews.title: Warranty promises  not fulfilled
customer_reviews.text: This product broke after a year or two. I have made repeated attempts to get it replaced or fixed. First the wrong parts were sent, then we were told they are out of parts. It has been two months. This product had a 5 year warranty. I bought two twins in 2016 and they both broke within two years. It was nice when it worked. But don’t expect any help from the company when something goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Rounkles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bed!
customer_reviews.text: It's very heavy, but that's a good thing. The bed is quiet, responds beautifully, and is wonderful for sitting up to play with my phone before sleep. My 10 inch mattress fits well, and an 8 or 12 would, too. I'm heavy, and there's no groaning, creaking, or any other indication that it matters. I highly recommend this bed! Oh, did I mention the two USB outlets? So useful!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Wood

customer_reviews.title: Worst product I ever bought from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: First of all, product bought should be new. The box it came in was pretty beat up and it was definately used. Bolts dont even screw in on the bed properly. It also came with tears on the trim. Definately got ripped off by this retailer. DO NOT BUY... THEY ARE A SCAM
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Compare to $1,200 Sealy unit that does same thing. Need two people to assemble! Especially helpful was the different height leg options. Be sure to measure the inside dimensions of the bed rails and head/foot boards if applicable. Ours was a tight fit. Especially liked the memory settings. Would suggest one added feature - a under the bed light.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Sisk

customer_reviews.title: Stoped working not long after I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bed at first loved it worked great then when I had put it in the flat position everything stoped working an won’t do anything at all now only had it for two months called customer care an because of tomorrow being the 4 th of July I can’t talk to anyone till Monday.hope to hear back from them I’ll post an update when they call me back
customer_reviews.author: Tina L. Conway

customer_reviews.title: not the best experience at all, lets see if the warranty works
customer_reviews.text: Bed was purchased July 9th. First it arrived in a destroyed damaged box, I didn't mind it since the bed look wrapped in plastic. Assembly was pretty easy. First day i noticed the head massage motor did not work as good as the leg one, didn't mind it much. Then 21 days after use, I woke up to it not working, i was noticing the bed randomly shifting while i am asleep. But wasn't sure until it fully stopped working today. I paid almost $600 for the bed with brackets and it is practically useless.... please refund my money or provide a replacement asap. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Sam I.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: I assumed we were opting for the cheap version of this (way more expensive at local mattress stores), but honestly we have had is like 2 years and it's still great. We have moved it a couple of times and it's not terrible to put it together. I was also nervous to buy something to enormous through Amazon. I mean how would ever return this thing?! But ultimately it really was fine. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A. Kusmaul

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS BED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 64 year old women with arthritis and acid reflux among other ailments. I have slept so much better with this bed as I have a hard time lying flat. Now I don't have to. Also the massager is a nice touch. Some days I come home from work and can barely move and I lie down on the bed and turn on the massager and feel so much better as it massages your legs too. I just bought the full size base and used my bed in a box coil spring matteress. It works great! I would definitely recomend this for older adults, but the grand kids love it too!!
customer_reviews.author: suziq_07

customer_reviews.title: Great buy 14 months later...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the King bed August 2018. It assembled very quickly and easily. After installing the tallest legs we realized with my physical limitations I could not get in to the bed. Hubby used the shortest legs and it's perfect. I've slept on this for14 months without a single issue until 2 nights ago - the entire bed quit working. We've walked through the troubleshooting steps a few times and its evident we need help. There's a light on the cord and the remote lights up, after inserting new batteries to be certain the batteries weren't an issue and absolutely nothing on turns on. No feet, no head and no massage. Please help!
customer_reviews.author: sheryl hobe

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Service
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box of the adjustable bed a connecting pin fell out. While I was installing the pin I noticed that a cotter key was missing. The next day I call the company's customer service and requested that a cotter key be sent to replace the one was missing. I was then told in order for the missing part to be sent to me I would need the following: 1) Written explanation 2) Copy of invoice 3) Picture of area After I provided the information, customer service would make a determination. My mistake was that I was given their 5 STAR Service and I should have received the 10 STAR Service.
customer_reviews.author: the kid

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this bed!! I ordered it in June, but wanted to test it out for awhile before I reviewed now I’ve had it for about 3 months and I’m so glad I bought it. Other buyers have had issues here n there with the remote or whatever but I haven’t experienced any of those problems. The only thing I could complain about is the strength of the massage feature but I didn’t buy it for that so it doesn’t matter to me. I think this adjustable bed is worth every cent I paid for it I haven’t slept this great in years
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Save all paper work - you WILL have problems with this base!
customer_reviews.text: Caution is advised! The first base I purchased turned out to have poorly designed legs that could not be tightened and that wobbled. Contacted the less-than-friendly and less-than-concerned customer service lady and explained the situation. About 3 weeks later a new base arrived with NO word from CS - we were totally blind-sided by the arrival of a completely new and better-designed base. We were happy! Now, after about 6 months of owning the new base, the lifting mechanism for the head (of the base) will rise and will promptly and slowly sink back down. Clearly, the lifting mechanism is defective. We are now trying to contact the company that sold the base. Stay tuned.
customer_reviews.author: jetames

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work :(
customer_reviews.text: So excited as delivery did not include the stairs to my upstairs apartment. They left outside after getting it up the stairs into doorway was pretty easy to set up. Then tried to adjust and nothing. Read troubleshooting remote won't link to box called talked to a Justin he informed me it needed a new box should arrive in 3 to 5 businesses days and I would get an email. This after sending him email of order and confirmed he received my email. And here it is almost 2 weeks later no email no box I have emailed "Justin" with no reply.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Originally this bed was decent and a good price. It stopped working less than 9 months after purchase. The remote still works and the bed itself still has power but they won’t connect any longer. Tried to reset and fix it but it won’t work. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Olofson

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: The bed is very easy to operate and VERY easy to put up. The massage is so relaxing and can be set how you want it the charging port will spoil you they are super fast and so handy. The customer service is one of the very best they are there to help you. Being 85 I needed some help and they walked me thru the problem and also emailed me the instructions I needed. Thank you to our great customer service dedpartment.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Got mine on 9-2019
customer_reviews.text: Got mine on 9 2019 and am loving it. I woke up from a coma and I needed a large bed so we got the king size and it was cheaper here then other places. But no issues at all. Love that I can relax and it helps me to slide off the bed when I lift the head area and can slid down. So am great full to have found this. I have a 14” memory foam matters on it no issues. Well I do need to find taller legs since I want to take advance of the beds storage under neath.
customer_reviews.author: Badillaboy

customer_reviews.title: Taillight Warranty.  This is my follow up review 4 months later flat on my back in my adjustable bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed May 4th 2020, The manufacturer still has not supplied a remote for this bed, this really defeats the purpose of an adjustable bed. I reported this the very first day to the manufacturer and in the course of 20 emails and 12 phone calls to Classic Brands I spoke with the same customer representative most times and each time there was a different story. This persons supervisor when forwarded will NEVER call you back. Avoid Classic Brand Beds or suffer the perils.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Get two frames left and right , they will send two right frames and no access to usb
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this split king bed frames , only thing is that when I order a split king they supposedly send you two twin xl frames but both frames had USB ports on right side , so when u put the two frames together one bed will not have access to the usb because is in between the beds , they need to send a right side and left side frames ( not two right sides ) other than that price and strength and everything else good , vibration not that strong
customer_reviews.author: Flfe02

customer_reviews.title: Caution only one side will actually has a usb port
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a split king..put it together and then I realized the usb port is on the right side only of the fame so when i put the two pieces together my usb port to charge my phone is now in the middle of the bed no access?? I called and spoke with justin and asked is there suppose to be a left and right he said no and I asked why wouldnt there be a usb port on both sides of a king and he said idk.?? Ok si no help there at all .so i guess instead of having a port on both sides is not possible...hmmm that's pretty stupid
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Unable to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this along with an adjustable frame. I wanted to attach the headboard but as you can see; one of the T bracket is missing. Contacted the manufacturer and I am still waiting on a replacement- it’s been over a month since I reported it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is useless!
customer_reviews.text: I received it today. Set it up, and for what? It doesn't work! You can hear the motor when you press the buttons on the remote but it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: bj

customer_reviews.title: Happy in Lakeland😀
customer_reviews.text: I was so please with this bed . I put together all by myself and had my brother and my son help turn it over into my bed frame. Very easy to assemble took me about 30 minutes. Works perfectly if you were thinking should I do it it's worth it . Delivery was right on time driver was very nice I was by myself and he help me get it in my living room thank you thank you thank you. I'm a woman and if I can put this king-size bed together by myself it's simple no special tools needed just a little hand strength but worth it thank you Classic bed
customer_reviews.author: Marquita

customer_reviews.title: Stay away...
customer_reviews.text: Unit was broken out of the box with a. Bad motor and the company refuses to honor warranty and replace under warranty. Email upon email about how shipping is broken yet they have no problems shipping out defective units. If they ever honor the warranty I may change this review. Until then I will do what I can to let people know their dishonesty.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, now its junk
customer_reviews.text: Was actually very impressed when we first ordered this base. Setup was easy, it worked great. The massage was a bit lacking but I didn't buy it for that. We've had it about a month or two now and it no longer works. The remote lights up, the USB works, if you unplug it you hear the motor for just a second.. but its dead. It doesn't adjust and there is no massage. I don't know if its the remote or something else but I know we just wasted money on a regular old bed frame now.
customer_reviews.author: Danelle Brinkman

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. BROKE LESS THAN 6 mos & AMAZON WILL NOT REPLACE OR REFUND
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. BROKE LESS THAN 6 mos & AMAZON WILL NOT REPLACE OR REFUND . Spent nearly 45 mins on the phone with customer service because my bed just stopped working just shy of 6 mos owning . I’m a 120lb female so there’s no reason this should just stop working . Customer service rep Vince was not helpful at all , I’m appalled by the lack of quality customer service. I would never purchase a big ticket item through amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: Great product & Customer service
customer_reviews.text: We have had the base a little over a year now and have been very happy. I placed the bed base in an RV with slideout. The adjustable legs made it possible to level the frame on an uneven floor. The features have all been great, adjustable head and feet for reading or watching TV. The vibrating function helps to lull me off to sleep nightly. I had an issue with the remote just a week ago and customer service was quick to respond and had the issue fixed by the next day
customer_reviews.author: jcampbell

customer_reviews.title: Bo more GERD
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine now. I had a broken one sent and contacted the manufacturer which is what they requested if any issues. They told me twice within a month they would resend a bed and it never showed. I contacted Amazon and they resolved it within a couple of days. The bed isn’t anything exciting. It’s purpose for me was to get elevated a bit to relieve GERD. It works well for what I needed. We haven’t had any GERD after a week of use.
customer_reviews.author: BAM123

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Had in Mind!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting an adjustable bed for years! Stacking pillows just wasn't working anymore! This bed is sooooo nice. It was easy to assemble, and easy to operate. Assembly instructions used actual photos of the bed making them so easy to follow. The silent remote has me finding just the right height for my head and feet without waking up the whole family! The the three level legs choice has the bed as high off the floor as needed. The cushioned frame gives the bed that touch of class! NO REGRETS IN PURCHASING THIS WONDERFUL BED!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Jennings

customer_reviews.title: King Size is Great
customer_reviews.text: - I purchased the King Size. - Easy to set up and place. - Its light weight and I can move it around as needed by myself. After a few month of use, I notice sometimes my phone doesn't charge when plugged into the outlets on the side. I need to unplug and replug and that resolves the issue. I'm very happy that I can adjust the height of the bed with the different lengths of feet. With the highest option, I can fit rolling drawers under the bed for extra storage. I rarely use the vibrate option but it's nice. I've had no issues with the motors or remote control. Very happy with this purchase. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: T. M.

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Bed works good after one year of use, but remote broke. Contacted customer service to try to purchase a new remote. After several emails, they just stopped replying. Would have given 5 stars if better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box every box was damaged. What am I to think? These boxes would be protected between the 2 bed pieces and wouldn't get damaged unless the whole bed is damaged. Even the remote box was damaged. Did I get a returned product and they didn't even care about putting the pieces in a new box? I don't know. After examining everything I did notice a small tear on the side of the bed near the USB box, but so small not to bother me. So now I worry did I get a returned product, will it last. Will update later if there are any problems.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Best decision in a very long time!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this frame for 5 months now and its held up well. Making this purchase has been the best decision I've made in a very long time! I've had 4 back surgeries and could never sleep through the night. Until I got this frame. I sleep like a rock and wake up in the same position I fell asleep in!! I would recommend this frame to anyone with back issues, anyone who has issues sleeping through the night.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hanes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Bad back leg swelling
customer_reviews.text: How do i start this Review Except just outstanding support given by Gayle I had some issues with the leg motor but Gayle was so good and professional immediately dispatched another motor which fixed the issue I have back issues and this Bed is awesome love the Remote control it has all the settings for a comfortable sleep I bought this thru Amazon which makes it all easy Unlike lots of other companies this one stands behind their Product which will surely be appreciated by their customers I have rods in back and elevation helps my leg swelling and zero Gravity helps with my back Thanks Gayle
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Split King Adjustable Base Package
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a split king adjustable base package offered by Amazon. Set up was rather easy and so far no issues although we have only used one night. I was totally shocked that the USB ports for both bases are on the right side of the bed so one set is totally useless. I would think that if they were selling as a split king package they would have usable ports for the left side of the bed as well. Definitely looses stars for that poor design.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed.  Parts are cheap but customer  service is great and the bed is so simple that it would easy to get fixed.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed. Update 11/14 Part was received immediately. I think a lot of broken parts are because people do not know how to outbid together the bed. Also, keep it away from wall. Update - 10/8 I emailed about the plug and received an instant reply, a real one, not automated. That is excellent customer service. If i actually get the plug this week, I will update the review and then try the product!!! One Star - PLUG BROKE the first time it was used. I will update this review depending if I receive a new plug immediately and depending on customer service. Its not a difficult concept so the price is right for this product.
customer_reviews.author: EustaciaX GenX@50

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Update*** Good customer support. They fedex'd a part 3 day to me and the bed is working again. 4 stars. Update** bed started vibrating in the middle of the night, won't respond to remote. I unplugged it and in the morning plugged it back in, now it just vibrates non stop and won't respond.. Lasted 3 weeks. Very easy to put together. It comes in 2 main parts and the motors and feet in separate boxes. I like that the feet allow you to lower the bed up to ~6-8". It is also very quiet. The remote took a few min to figure out but it works well. This is a significant savings over the major brand models.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the purchase. Set up and attachment to the headboard was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: The bed came assembled with me only needing to screw on the legs (no tools required)! I ordered the queen size bed with the 10.5" cool gel mattress. I am a stomach sleeper and was concerned that the memory foam would be too soft, but it is just perfect. The apholstered frame looks finished with no need to get a head/foot board frame. The vibration feature is fine but not like a full massage chair. Patents on memory foam mattresses have long expired and the quality of this bed is equal to any of the name brands.
customer_reviews.author: David P Guy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this adjustable base (full-size) for my bed-bound sister. It was so easy to put together that 1 female caretaker was able to do the minimal assembly required. My sister and the caretaker assure me the bed is sturdy, the massage feature works wonderfully and my sister couldn't be happier with the bed. Note: I also bought the available mattress and she says it's very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Remember to let the motors cool down between position changes!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was great, although early 6:45 AM! They brought it up to the front door and down the hall. It went together easy and works as promised. I was reading the label on the motors, they have a 2 minute duty cycle then they need to cool down for 18 minutes, a 10% duty cycle, normal for inexpensive high load motors. That might be the problem many reviewers are having, it's tempting and fun to raise it up and down and try different positions ,but remember to let it cool down or the motors won't last long. So far I love it!.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noisy and Lumpy
customer_reviews.text: Base: Assembly requires two adults. One to do the mechanics and one to use psychic powers to interpret the brochure. The first piece did not fit. The holes were misaligned and required re-drilling. The allen wrench provided is of poor quality and painful to use. The brochures are elaborately illustrated. Unfortunately, these illustrations do not depict steps or processes. Once assembled, the base responds to the remote. The mechanics are noisy and produce alarming squeaks and moans. Mattress: Cover is crooked and asymmetrical. This causes a list to starboard, giving the sensation of falling. I had hoped that some of these conditions would self correct with use. That has not happened and I am stuck with this uncomfortable monstrosity.
customer_reviews.author: doris jones

customer_reviews.title: Vibration motors go out too soon...No customer service
customer_reviews.text: Vibration motors have gone out in less than a year! I have back issues and LOVE this product... Im hoping someone from customer service reaches out to me because I am unsure of how to contact them. Update: No word from customer service as I did reach out to them.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Robert

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and I love all the positions.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic wonderful adjustable bed frame. Finally at last I can sleep in a bed instead of on a recliner!!! My back has hurt so much I haven’t slept in a bed for about 15 years. I also bought a Zinus queen 13” mattress to go with this wonderful base. I sleep with my feet up to prevent leg swelling and with my head raised to prevent sinus headaches and very bad back pain. Just be very careful that the cords are out of the way of the bed movements !
customer_reviews.author: Sherry B.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great value
customer_reviews.text: The price for this adjustable base with all it's features is phenomenal. Vibrate, Zero G, and TV Watching are already preprogrammed. The vibration is pretty strong but could probably be just a little faster but still does the job. Quiet motor for adjusting and sturdy frame mean you're not shaking all over the place like some frames. Wasn't very hard to put together and took me maybe 30 minutes. The remote is a little busy in that it has almost as many buttons as my TV and a few I haven't and probably won't touch but some people prefer to have ALL the options.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and works great. On top of that Amazon delivery service is incredible. I was concerned this would not be delivered as scheduled but to my surprise it arrived on time and the delivery person even brought it in the house. My mother is using this after having multiple surgeries on a Her leg and needed the ability to elevate it. She said using this adjustable bed with the 10" mattress is the first time she has really been comfortable since having surgery. That alone is worth the price. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not provide the results as desired.Would not recommend it.High price,low quality
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the product as this does not fulfill the promises it makes in terms of quality.very high price but Zero gravity and anti snoring functions are useless and have zero effect.Also company is not keeping cost constant.They reduced the cost of product by 90$ after i purchased it and i could not return it as there was 70$ charge for returning..ridiculous..they should show some ownership and return the cost difference specially since i am totally unhappy with the product quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous adjustable bed
customer_reviews.text: So far this adjustable bed is the greatest thing ever! Easy to adjust and very quiet to operate. The only thing we had a tiny bit of trouble with was the set up, while easy to follow the directions, you need to have enough open space in your room to put this together and luckily we did. You assemble the bed upside down then flip it over, completely assembled, which was a bit tricky but was able to be done with two people. We had an existing bed frame we were placing this inside of so that created our assembly space to be limited. We are so happy with the purchase and this bed gets five stars all the way!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Adjustable Base.  But if it stops working do this.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bed. Very happy with purchase. It did stop working one day because the remote was no longer paired with the bed. Just follow the instructions in this picture to pair the remote again.
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Base not working after three months and no support responded
customer_reviews.text: I have called support twice , with no help to the problem of why my base is not working at all, she walked me through resetting my remote but it is not provlem. There is no clicking sound when i press the buttons and the power is working fine. I purchased three of these adjustable and i still no resolution to my problem. I will try again to make contact and will update .
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: When I plugged it in and installed the batteries in the remote, it literally came to life!
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit skeptical buying this adjustable base, sight unseen. Quick shipping and good packaging eased my apprehension somewhat when it arrived, but when I unpacked it it practically assembled itself. Kinda foolproof. I like the way that all the cables were clearly marked. When I plugged it in and installed the batteries in the remote, it literally came to life. I checked all functions on the remote and they worked fine. Now it’s the test of time to see how it’ll hold up. Highly recommend. Best price on the internet was at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dan P. Sr.

customer_reviews.title: The Best Is Classic Brands Adjustable Comfort Adjustable Bed Base+Massage And Wireless Remote
customer_reviews.text: This bed is built Rock solid Buy It you will be glad you did. I want to take a moment to tell you I had A Problem with the remote not working like it should I could get by with it the way it was but decided to call the Manufacturer. Told Gayle @ Classic Brands the problem she sent me a new Wireless Remote Very Quickly and it works perfect just like my Wife's. yes I did buy 2 and They are worth far more than I Paid and The Service is Priceless. thank you again Classic Brands for being a caring company with High Quality Products.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Excrement  DO NOT BUY ANYTHING FROM THEM
customer_reviews.text: foot motor never worked. Contacted customer support. They sent another control box, that did not work at all. Went from only foot motor not working, to nothing working. Customer support was difficult to reach, communicate with, and get a response from. DO NOT BUY ANYTHING from this company. We have had equally bad experience with memory foam mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhael E Weitzel

customer_reviews.title: No more sleeping in a recliner.
customer_reviews.text: For probably 8 years or more I have slept in a recliner, my back would freeze up lying flat in a bed. I actually got this cause my ankle was starting to shoot sharp pains at night in the recliner. I love the massage, I will put it on high and it helps to relax my back and my legs and ankles. I let the dogs up until I go to sleep, nice to have room for them. I do have to have a way for the one to jump down, she has arthritis. So I switched from the med height to the low height, also easier for me to get in with the height of the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You'll never sleep flat again
customer_reviews.text: sleeping flat is so archaic after sleeping on an adjustable bed. we have had these for 3 years now and hate going away for a weekend and sleeping flat. it really is incredible how much of a difference it makes to sleep better, snoring, etc. and you really don't adjust it much once you find your spot. we thought we'd be going up and down on a daily basis but i don't think we have moved our spots for a couple months. We matched these with a tuft and needle twin xl and pushed two together. Been working awesome together.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this adjustable bed with message
customer_reviews.text: Love this adjustable bed with message.. I should have done this months ago.. With my back issues it has made life allot better.. LOVE MY ADJUSTABLE BED.. I will wait a couple of months and add to the comments on how well it is still working.. So far no issues and I use it allot... I have slept on it 7 nights now..and it feels great to be able to relax to the massage that has a timer so it will cut off if you fall asleep.. The positioning helps allot with back comfort... If you have back issues I would say order it..
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Bud

customer_reviews.title: OMG - What a surprise - It is fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I thought buying something less expensive than the "Big Name brand Store brand" would be less quality. WRONG!! You would think it came from the BIG NAME BRAND STORE for sure. I is really heavy - definitely need help to move it, but it is wonderful. It bends and vibrates like I never expected. For less than half of the BIG NAME BRAND STORE same item. I love it and highly recommend. !!!!!!100 Stars in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Suzie B

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as well as two (2) Classic Brands Adjustable Comfort Upholstered Adjustable Bed Base without Massage. The intent was to have the massage for myself and the use the others in the guest rooms. If I had to do it over again, I would not have spent the extra monies on the base with massage. There is a huge difference between massage and vibration. This is just vibration. That said, I love the adjustable base and this product was a great value. Very easy to put together. Highly recommend (without the massage).
customer_reviews.author: LaNee Evans

customer_reviews.title: I'll be keeping the bedframe because It's easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: The massage is very loud. People in other rooms can hear it running, but it's not exactly a problem during the day. The plastic around the foot motor broke on the first night while raising the legs, but I don't believe it damaged the motor at all. Overall, I'll be keeping the bedframe because It's easy to put up, I like the ability to raise and lower the frame, but I will be asking for a new motor part. There's no reason this thing should break with no bed, and no person on it when you raise the legs or head.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bed bsae, love Snore button  and double move buttons
customer_reviews.text: This is very good base . it is kind of heavy to carry upstairs but is worth it. With some help of another person i set it up and love the setup . so far 3 nights , slept like a baby !! i almost bought sleepnumber bed but decided to go for individual base frame and hybrid mattress . i feel that it is better than the airbed.
customer_reviews.author: Nadeem Amin

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable Bed Frame, Easy to Assemble, but Shipping Could be a Problem
customer_reviews.text: The bed is just fine; very comfortable, including the "zero gravity" setting. We have a thick foam mattress, and it does require large sheets to tuck under when the foot end is elevated. However, the shipping was a problem, in that the large cardboard box was gouged and left a small hole in the surface of the bed. It doesn't show, but I don't know how to repair it (duct tape?), and my grandson and I had worked hard to put it together, so we were not about to return it. By the way, the instructions for assembly are easy, but it does take a strong guy to screw on the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Monika Lumsdaine

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the king size for a month now, and I love it! My husband was amazed at the power of the massage feature. We bought another brand from a local furniture store and it was $1400 without the massage or USB features. It was well worth the hassle of the return. The only thing that disappointed me on this one is that the USB is only located on one side of each frame, so the left side of the bed doesn't have one because it is on the inside of the two twin frames. I didn't really care about that feature, so no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: snoopygirl22

customer_reviews.title: this thing is great, heavy and hard to move but my fiance ...
customer_reviews.text: don't buy into the hype at your local bed store. this thing is great, heavy and hard to move but my fiance and I moved it and i had it together in about 20 min. My package came damaged and the fabric was torn a bit but Amazon gave me a nice discount and it still works perfect. no issues with the remote or motors. It does however catch on our bed frame you don't need a frame we just like a head and footboard. I am going to replace the side panels to make it about 5" longer but still 100% worth the price. $1,600 at our local store and we got two prices.this is a great deal
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable bed's motors dying out after 8 months.
customer_reviews.text: I was originally very happy with this product but now it is not functioning very well at all. I purchased this bed 8 months ago and now the motor barely functions. The head either chooses not to rise or it goes up verrrrry slowly. Same with the feet. I feel like overall the motors have gone kaput on me. I contacted the manufacturer today and have not heard back. I will update this review if they come to me with a solution but let this be a warning, the motor is functioning very poorly on mine.
customer_reviews.author: Adam R.

customer_reviews.title: Solid but doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Update: they were nice and sent out remote but the bed still doesn't work I assume it's the motor. We've been emailing and calling for a week now and no one has gotten back to us. :( If we don't hear back before weekend. We are returning it and moving to something different! It's been 3 weeks now. It's nice and solid but the remote doesn't work. It worked for about 2 minutes and the bed was loud. Got stuck in upright position. We're calling to get a new remote sent. But I hope it isn't that loud all the time!
customer_reviews.author: S. wells

customer_reviews.title: Full size adjustable bed
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately the bed came mostly assembled. All the motors were already installed and the two halves were folded up and just had to unfold the halves and lay the frame upside down and screw all the legs on. Then turn the bed over and put the mattress on. Plug the motors into an outlet and thye bed was in operation. Really easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Pretty lousy
customer_reviews.text: I’ll start with the cons: -supplied wrench too big for supplied bolts - most bolts were cross threaded from factory - no installation instructions (just wing it! and hope its right!) - after the battle is over, the headboard isn’t even sturdy and flops all over Pros....can’t think of any
customer_reviews.author: Keith C.

customer_reviews.title: Two rights don't make a left.
customer_reviews.text: I knew it was split as 2 twin longs but I assumed there was a right and a left. But they are exactly the same and the problem with that is the USB chargers for one side end up in between the two sides making that feature useless for one person. Other than that it's an excellent bedframe.
customer_reviews.author: Vinny

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Our adjustable bed frame worked great for a couple of months. Now it doesn't seem to work properly at all. No matter what button you push on the remote it doesn't do what it supposed to do, if you push the lounge button it goes flat if you push the TV button it goes flat. The only way you can make adjustments is to push the head or foot buttons up or down and it bounces when it adjusting!!! Once you turn on the vibration you can't turn it off, you have to let it run its cycle. This is turning out to be pure junk, I do not recommend!! We haven't even had our bed for nine months
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Can't get it to respond to the remote
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bed for my mother and couldn't get it to stop vibrating without unplugging it. So I we left it unplugged. After moving my mother to a nursing home, I brought the bed home. As soon as I plugged it in, it started vibrating. The bed rarely responds to pressing buttons on the remote. Got the foot to raise once and now it won't go back down. There is something serious wrong with the remote or the control unit. I hope I get a response from the manufacturer. If so, I will post a follow up.
customer_reviews.author: Joe K

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall
customer_reviews.text: Heavy adjustable base which is good, doesn't appear cheap. Mechanically so far it does what it suppose to. The vibration is ok, but it might be that my Cali King mattress is extra thick. The USB is too low, sits under my side rails, so can use them. The remote works fine, except some buttons I dont know what they do, like the anti snoring which seems to do nothing. But, overall I love the product for the value and cost. Price way better than the store. Just hope the motor dont give out.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Glover

customer_reviews.title: Everything went together great, open the second one and it looked like ...
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered 2 of the twin xl base, opened the first one no problem. Everything went together great, open the second one and it looked like it was opened, tried to put together, and returned. The box with the legs was ripped open, half of the box was gone. The holes for the bar to hold the mattress from sliding down by the foot part of the bed were on the top part marked head. Not to bad if you have some DYI skills but very disappointing for the price. I don't mind putting stuff together but to have to drill holes and secure legs on with extra bolts that I had is not good.
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Seemed easy enough to put together abs has a nice aesthetic look....but the foot portion doesn’t work. I have tried to troubleshoot the problem with their “technical support”; with no success in resolving the issue. After looking at the online manual, I am wondering if someone returned this base for the same reason. The motors and everything were already put together. I only had to attach the legs. There should’ve been more steps and parts to assemble (motors in boxes) according to the manual literature and photos. I am dreading sending this back, as the delivery was not as stated either.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: They worked for the Ananda split king frame.
customer_reviews.text: Theses brackets are very adjustable for any bed frame with pillar legs. The clamp for the legs measures 1 3/4 inch diameter closed and up to 2 3/8 inch diameter open. You could use it on a larger diameter leg but woul need longer screws. With everything tightened this holds a headboard firmly. I used them on the split king adjustable frames that come with the Ananda mattress sets. I believe they are the same as Sleep Zone adjustable frames. I do recommend these brackets and I am pleased with their performance.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley K Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping better
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my mom and she loved it, so I bought one for myself. There is a preset on the remote for snoring that lifts your head a bit. I've been sleeping like that. I do not know if I have stopped snoring or not, but I do sleep deeper for longer and wake feeling much better that I used to! I put mom's together and it was not difficult at all, but you need 2 people to flip it over once assembled. I ended up paying to have it delivered to my bedroom (upstairs) and did not realize that included setup and hauling away of packing material. Excellent value! Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ShellyP

customer_reviews.title: mattress slips . customer service  lousy  ! otherwise works fine and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this product, and am using it for about a week. Assembly was effortless, vibration is OK. The big issue is mattress slides to the side. i wake up and mattress is 6 + inches off the side. I called support, someone working from home answered and said he cant help me. He suggested I email his manager(not reachable by phone). i did! and that is as far as it went. no return email , no return call. in other works useless. So if your okay with being on your own after purchase it's not bad. If you need the ability to communicate with customer service, this product is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: simonw

customer_reviews.title: Am lovin' this frame!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, tho quite heavy (200 lbs!) once the full king frame was assembled. Was worried about the legs taking all that weight on one side as my DH and myself flipped it over, but had no issues even with the max leg height. Would recommend 2 strong men to lift then flip it, but a guy and a gal can handle just tipping it like we did. Remote works great, and I love all the possible settings! It also fit perfectly inside our existing king sleigh bed frame. Overall a great buy, and I was lucky enough to order it 2 weeks ago for $614, price has since gone up to $730!!!
customer_reviews.author: AronInLHP
